James raised a question about onboarding costs.
Expected close date for contract finalization.

AI_GENERATED_SUMMARY: The sales rep, Bruce, sent the Cloud Sync Expansion proposal to prospect James. James raised a minor objection about deferring onboarding costs, which Bruce swiftly accommodated by agreeing to a delayed payment structure and sending a revised proposal. The conversation concluded with both parties confirming next steps for contract preparation and implementation, indicating a positive progression towards closing the deal.

Next_Steps: Schedule a follow-up call for next week
RECOMMENDATIONS.Escalation_Triggers: If no response is received within 3 days after sending the revised proposal.
RECOMMENDATIONS.Deal_Acceleration_Tactics: Offer additional incentives for early contract signing.

Email_Draft.subject: Follow-up on Cloud Sync Expansion Proposal
Email_Draft.body:
Hi James,

I hope this message finds you well! I wanted to follow up on the revised proposal I sent over regarding the Cloud Sync Expansion. Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can assist with. Looking forward to your feedback!

Best,
Bruce

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi James, just checking in to see if you had a chance to review the revised proposal. Let me know if you need any further clarification!
